response.overview: An orphaned boy raised by underground creatures called Boxtrolls comes up from the sewers and out of his box to save his family and the town from the evil exterminator, Archibald Snatcher.
response.tagline: When troubles strikes friends stack together.
response.title: The Boxtrolls

cast.name: James Urbaniak
cast.character: Sir Broderick / Male Workman 1 / Male Workman 2 (voice)
